body:
Ruqqies!

I was curious about the makeup of the site in terms of user ages. Also, if I had a poll, I would use a poll. 

Edit: I have created a Straw Poll for more anonymous answering:

https://strawpoll.com/bapgz1we

Which age group are you in?

18 or Younger
19-24
25-29
30-34
35-39
40-50
51-65
66+


Alternatively, what generation do you consider yourself part of?

-----------------------------------------------------------------

I'll go first. I am in the 25-29 age group.
body_html:
Ruqqies!

I was curious about the makeup of the site in terms of user ages. Also, if I had a poll, I would use a poll.

Edit: I have created a Straw Poll for more anonymous answering:

https://strawpoll.com/bapgz1we

Which age group are you in?

18 or Younger 19-24 25-29 30-34 35-39 40-50 51-65 66+

Alternatively, what generation do you consider yourself part of?

I'll go first. I am in the 25-29 age group.
title: Ruqqies - how old are you?

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body:
25-29

Despite falling into the category, I don't consider myself a Millennial, despite the fact that I'm closer to the Zoomer border than the Gen X one. I tend to relate more to Gen X, ever since I was a kid. Not sure why.
body_html:
25-29

Despite falling into the category, I don't consider myself a Millennial, despite the fact that I'm closer to the Zoomer border than the Gen X one. I tend to relate more to Gen X, ever since I was a kid. Not sure why.

I was curious about the makeup of the site in terms of user ages. Also, if I had a poll, I would use a poll.

Edit: I have created a Straw Poll for more anonymous answering:

https://strawpoll.com/bapgz1we

Which age group are you in?

18 or Younger 19-24 25-29 30-34 35-39 40-50 51-65 66+

Alternatively, what generation do you consider yourself part of?

I'll go first. I am in the 25-29 age group.
post.title: Ruqqies - how old are you?
